tuv.seg: Traveller children have the same rights to education as settled children
Tá na cearta oideachais céanna ag páistí an lucht siúil is atá ag páistí lonnaithe
They are also subject to the same rules on school attendance
Caithfidh siad na rialacha a bhaineann le freastal ar an scoil a chomhlíonadh mar a chéile
A Traveller child can access additional learning supports in primary school and supports in post-primary school if there is an identified educational need

Féadfaidh leanbh den Lucht Siúil rochtain a fháil ar bhreis tacaíochtaí foghlama sa bhunscoil agus ar thacaíochtaí i scoil iar-bhunscoile má shainaithnítear go bhfuil riachtanas oideachais ag an leanbh sin
Oideachas don Lucht Siúil a chomhordú
The Advisory Committee on Traveller Education published a Report and Recommendations for a Traveller Education Strategy (pdf)
D’fhoilsigh an Coiste Comhairleach ar an Oideachas don Lucht Siúil Tuarascáil agus Moltaí do Straitéis Oideachais don Lucht Siúil
A key objective of the report is the phasing out of segregated Traveller provision and the inclusion of Traveller children and young people in mainstream education
Príomhchuspóir na tuarascála is ea deireadh a chur, de réir a chéile, leis an soláthar don Lucht Siúil agus chun leanaí agus daoine óga den Lucht Siúil a chuimsiú in oideachas príomhshrutha
Guidelines on Traveller education in primary schools and post-primary schools are available from the Department of Education and Skills
Tá fáil ar threoirlínte maidir le hoideachas don Lucht Siúil i mbunscoileanna agus in iar-bhunscoileanna ar fáil ón Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
The Department of Education and Skills is responsible for the co-ordination of Traveller education
Tá an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna freagrach as oideachas an Lucht Siúil a chomhordú
